title: Adding a New Project
body:
Adding a New Project¶

  1. Click the <i class=”fa fa-bars”></i> menu icon in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Projects

  4. Click the <i class=”fa fa-plus”></i> plus icon in the upper right hand corner

  5. Enter a project title

  6. Choose a type

  7. Enter a program code

  8. Enter a source code

  9. Enter a match

  10. Enter a main project code

  11. Enter a country project code

  12. Click Save
toc: • Adding a New Project
